extractFactDictList.question: What is the AAP?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Apart from these national parties, there are regional parties which are dominant in their respective states, such as the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) in Delhi, All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (AIADMK) in Tamil Nadu, Samajwadi Party (SP) in Uttar Pradesh, Telugu Desam Party (TDP) in Andhra Pradesh/Telangana, Shiv Sena in Maharashtra, and various others.
